movies.name: Die Hard
movies.description: An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and others taken hostage during a Christmas party in Los Angeles.

movies.name: Home Alone
movies.description: A young boy defends his home from burglars after being accidentally left behind during Christmas vacation.

movies.name: Elf
movies.description: A man raised as an elf at the North Pole travels to New York City to find his real father and spread Christmas cheer.

movies.name: The Polar Express
movies.description: A magical train ride to the North Pole teaches a boy about friendship, bravery, and the spirit of Christmas.

movies.name: Love Actually
movies.description: Interwoven stories of love and relationships unfold during the holiday season in London.

movies.name: The Santa Clause
movies.description: An ordinary man accidentally becomes Santa Claus and must embrace his new role to save Christmas.
